评论详情: This item is extremely long for shorter petite body type.  It’s nice quality but way too long to wear with shorts.  Will be wearing with leggings in the fall.

I’m a size large, because I like something to hide stomach and butt. I ordered a XXL. So it turned out great because It’s not sticking to any of my body parts that I don’t like. It’s not super thin material like how soMe workout shirts are.
Great color, but it's thin and runs large.

Racetrack workout top. Material feels nice. Stretchy, not restricting. The armholes are on the larger side. Recommend Wearing a sports bra underneath. Color is a nice heathered teal blue color. Short is not clingy and moves with while exercising. I can’t attest to the wicking as I don’t sweat much. Would purchase again.
Love the way it looks and the colors
Love this tank! Fit is great, material feels good. It will be one of my go to tank tops for comfort and style.
Top is cute but too small at the waist.  I think it would look good on someone with a slim build.
I love the material. Great for my morning runs. It was just smaller than I was expecting so not lose of me but super comfortable

评论概述: great for working out or running around town.
